text:
rain in seattle,
don't forget an umbrella,
or it will be gloom

my tunes on repeat,
it's time for me to dj,
have you heard this one?

snow is still falling,
is it time for apres yet?
let's do one more run

beep boop bop beep boop,
i am robot octocat,
i think there's a bug

same plot as before,
so why is it still awesome?
i think it's the hat

code commits at dawn,
pull requests await review,
merge conflict appears

dancing in the rain,
puddles reflect the bright sky,
joy in every splash

vinyl spins slowly,
melodies from years gone by,
nostalgia returns

mountain peaks so white,
fresh powder calls to my soul,
one more run till dusk

hero saves the day,
with courage and a cool hat,
legend never dies
